extDescription.message: Provides additional features to Youtube. It can be used by checking the item you want to add.

Options_Description.message: On this setting screen, the setting items are reflected immediately. However, the setting items are applied only to the current page, so if you want the settings to be reflected permanently, you need to save them. Also, if you want to use the saved contents on other pages, you need to reload the settings.

Options_UseLocalDescription.message: Use settings only on this device.

Options_UseSyncDescription.message: Shared to devices that do not have "Use local storage" set to ON.

FullscreenChat_Description.message: View chat list in full screen

FullscreenChat_CardOpacityHover.message: Opacity for Super Chat on hover

ChatTickerScroll_Description.message: Mouse scrolling in Super Chat list
